title: Fiji Adults-Only Beachfront Luxury on Malolo Island with All-Inclusive Dining & FJ$500 Drinks Credit
description:
Escape to Fiji's picture-perfect Malolo Island with a stay at Likuliku Lagoon Resort, where romance, luxury and relaxed tropical living combine for a stay like no other in the South Pacific. Sitting on the edge of Malolo Island, in the Mamanuca archipelago, this proudly Fijian-owned, multi-award-winning resort is a short boat ride, seaplane or helicopter flight from Nadi, but a world away from everyday life. Perched on the edge of a turquoise lagoon, this idyllic retreat is surrounded by a protected marine sanctuary - making it the ideal spot for Fiji's very first overwater bures in a natural ocean environment.

The adults-only resort combines the very best in Fijian design with contemporary features, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave. Laze on a lounger by the large infinity pool or settle in for an afternoon of complete and utter serenity at Tatadra Spa, offering a selection of shoulder-sinking treatments that combine local and global techniques. Explore a unique underwater world by snorkelling, swimming and kayaking through the calm waters of the lagoon, and finish the day with a daily-changing à la carte menu at Fijiana Restaurant. Here, the resort's executive chef showcases Likuliku’s cuisine using the finest local and international produce and placing an emphasis on local seafood, lush tropical fruits, premium products and the diversity of cultures that shape the South Pacific.

title: Fiji Award-Winning Adults-Only Island Paradise with Daily Dining & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Let romance find you among the exquisite beaches, glittering azure waters and swaying coconut trees of Fiji's Mamanuca Islands, staying at the adults-only Tropica Island Resort, an award-winning retreat ranked among the top 1% worldwide on Tripadvisor.

Set in a sheltered bay perfectly placed for relaxation, privacy, beachfront romance and world-class snorkelling, Tropica is one of those unforgettable resorts where time seems to stand still. Inspired by Fiji’s breathtaking tropical landscape, each beautifully appointed bure offers a haven of relaxation and rejuvenation through its open-plan design and blissful surrounds. The poolside restaurant invites guests to indulge in an ocean-view, open-air dining experience with curated Fijian delicacies, homecooked favourites and exceptional service. Unwind at Tropica's heavenly spa, explore the nearby islands by complimentary kayak or take a seat at the beachfront bar to watch the blazing sunset over Malolo Bay. If you can pull yourself away from the gorgeous shores, why not jet 15 minutes across the open ocean by speedboat and spend a day at Fiji's impressive Cloud 9 Beach Club? Whatever you choose, peace, privacy and romance are guaranteed.

title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Fiji Retreat with Daily Drinks and Dining
description: Let romance find you among the exquisite beaches, glittering azure waters and swaying coconut trees of the Mamanuca Islands, staying at the adults-only paradise of Tropica Island Resort. Set in a sheltered bay that’s perfectly placed for extreme relaxation, beachfront romance and world-class snorkelling, Tropica is one of those unforgettable resorts where time seems to stop and you immediately feel off-the-grid. Here, it’s all about the flop-and-drop, indulgent inclusions, which include daily à la carte breakfast, daily three-course dinners of fresh Fijian-style cuisine, daily hour of local beer, selected wine and canapés, one blissful 60-minute massage per person and a 15-minute foot soak, a welcome bottle of wine and complimentary Bula butler service.
offer_address: Malolo Island, Mamanuca Islands, Fiji, Malolo Levu, Fiji

title: Fiji Adults-Only Beachfront Luxury on Malolo Island with All-Inclusive Dining & Daily FJ$100 Credit
description:
Escape to picture-perfect, wilderness luxury with a stay at this beachfront hideaway, where romance and relaxed tropical living combine for a stay like no other in the South Pacific. Sitting on the edge of Malolo Island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this proudly Fijian-owned resort is a short boat ride or helicopter flight from Nadi, but a world away from everyday life.

Laze on a lounger by the infinity pool or settle in for an afternoon of serenity at Tatadra Spa, offering a selection of shoulder-sinking treatments. Snorkel, swim or kayak through the underwater world and calm lagoon waters, and finish the day with a ever-changing a la carte menu at Fijiana Restaurant. The resort's executive chef uses the finest local and international produce to showcase the diverse cultures of the South Pacific.

Set on the edge of a turquoise lagoon, this retreat is surrounded by a protected marine sanctuary. Following a major early-2025 renovation, be among the first to enjoy revamped villas, a refreshed main pool and the grand opening of Saluwaki Restaurant, serving up Fijian cuisine and a curated Asian tapas experience.

title: Award-Winning Fiji Adults-Only Retreat on Malolo Island in the Mamanuca Archipelago
description:
Discover Fiji’s only overwater bures - exclusively at Likuliku Lagoon Resort - where barefoot luxury meets the shimmering turquoise of the South Pacific. Designed exclusively for adults, this sanctuary is crafted with couples in mind, offering uninterrupted ocean views, direct lagoon access and the perfect setting for romance. Just a short boat ride from the mainland, but worlds away in atmosphere, this award-winning resort is nestled on the edge of a crystal-clear lagoon, within a protected marine sanctuary. 

Every detail is rooted in sustainability, from a native tree planting program to its efforts in protecting the critically endangered Fijian crested iguana. Spend your days soaking up the sun by the infinity pool, surrendering to blissful treatments at Tatadra Spa or indulging in ever-changing culinary delights at Fijana Restaurant.

title: Malolo Island Adults-Only Tropical Paradise in Fiji
description: Experience a secluded island escape at the adults-only Tropica Island Resort. Boasting lush tropical gardens, a beachfront infinity pool and uninterrupted views of the sparkling Pacific Ocean, Tropica Island Resort allows you to completely unwind. Step from the comfort of your luxurious bure onto the white-sand beach, where you can enjoy an array of water-based activities, including snorkelling and kayaking, or indulge in a restorative treatment at Tropica Day Spa, before dining under the stars at Lakalaka Restaurant & Bar.

title: Fiji Five-Star Six Senses Serenity in the Mamanuca Archipelago
description: Escape to Six Senses Fiji, where romance, luxury and relaxed tropical living combine for an escape like no other in the South Pacific. Perched on powder-white shores on Malolo Island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this award-winning resort is a short boat ride from Fiji’s capital, but a world away from everything else. The resort puts sustainability at the forefront - it creates its own energy, grows its own organic produce, and has invested in the repopulation and protection of the critically endangered Fijian crested iguana through a successful captive breeding program. The luxury resort combines the very best in Fijian design with contemporary features, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave.

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Bure Hideaway with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Escape the everyday to a Fijian paradise at Malolo Island Resort, an island haven 100% owned by a local Fijian family, where the primary focus is reconnecting with loved ones among the tropical treasures of the South Pacific. To preserve the pristine beaches, colourful coral reefs and swaying coconut palms that surround the gorgeous bures, the property place heavy importance on sustainable tourism by implementing conservation efforts across the resort. After relaxing among the spotless scenery, taste the island's flavours at the resort's restaurants, sip tropical cocktails at Beach Bar, or spend the evening at a private beach dinner after dropping the little ones at the onsite Kids' Club.
offer_address: Malolo Island, Mamanucas, Yaro, Fiji Islands
